summary: NAR 5/7/03. 2001 VW WINNEBAGO RIALTA.   WHILE DRIVING, 2 OF THE AUXILIARY COOLING FANS DISINTEGRATED, WHICH CAUSED THE RV TO SHAKE TERRIBLY AND THE RV BECAME DIFFICULT TO CONTROL. THE CONSUMER MANAGED TO PULL OVER, BUT EVEN AFTER TURNING OFF THE ENGINE. THE COOLING FAN MOTORS CONTINUED TO RUN. AFTER THE FAN MOTOR STOPPED, THE CONSUMER LOOKED UNDER THE HOOD AND DISCOVERED THE DISINTEGRATED FAN BLADE.  *JB
